title: "Nanite Inc. Receives Up to $2M Investment from CF Foundation to Explore a Novel Method to Deliver Genetic Therapies to the Lung"
excerpt: "Nanite Inc. announced today an investment from the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation of up to $2 million to develop gene delivery technologies for the lung. This investment builds on the $6M seed financing recently announced by the company."
